div.p: Hudson Schools prepare each student for post-secondary success through challenging academics, critical thinking skills, purposeful collaboration, applied innovation, and global stewardship. We challenge students to become informed, caring contributors locally, nationally and globally.

div.p: Do you have a question or concern about Hudson Schools? Please fill out this form and we will contact you. If this is regarding a specific school, please go to that school’s page and submit your question or concern there. Thank you for your interest in Hudson Schools.

input.name: email

div.p: Official government website for the City of Hudson, Wisconsin.

img.alt: Hudson Area Chamber of Commerce and Tourism Bureau Logo
Hudson Area Chamber of Commerce and Tourism Bureau Logo

div.p: Discover Hudson’s attractions, parks and history.

img.alt: Phipps Center for the Arts Logo
Phipps Center for the Arts Logo

div.p: Performances, exhibitions and classes that provide accessible artistic experiences for everyone.
Hudson, Wisconsin’s weekly, hometown newspaper since 1854.

div.h2: “We must educate our children in what no one knew yesterday, and prepare our schools for what no one knows yet.”

div.div: Hudson schools challenge students to be informed, caring contributors to our world through challenging academics, critical thinking, purposeful collaboration, applied innovation and global stewardship. As one of Wisconsin’s high performing school districts, serving over 5,500 students in pre-kindergarten through 12th grade, our core vision is to prepare each student for post-secondary success.
